panels.description: Top SQL ordered by Elapsed Time

targets.expr:
topk(200, 
     sum ((mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest", alias=~"$alias"} -
           mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest", alias=~"$alias"})
     by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
    )

topk(200, 
     sum ((mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest=~"$digest", alias=~"$alias"} -
           mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest=~"$digest", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest=~"$digest", alias=~"$alias"})
     by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
    )

topk(200, 
     sum ((mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest=~"$digest", alias=~"$alias"} -
           mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest=~"$digest", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest=~"$digest", alias=~"$alias"})
     by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
    )

panels.description: Top SQL ordered by Elapsed Time

targets.expr:
topk(3,(
   sum(max_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{alias="$alias", digest="$digest"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{alias="$alias", digest="$digest"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(3,(
   sum(max_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{alias="$alias", digest="$digest"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{alias="$alias", digest="$digest"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(3,(
   sum(max_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{alias="$alias", digest="$digest"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{alias="$alias", digest="$digest"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk (2,
   rate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[$intv])
   or irate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[5m])
)

topk (2,
   rate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[$intv] offset $diff_intv)
   or irate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[5m] offset $diff_intv)
) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

panels.description: The number of executions per second of statements.

targets.expr:
topk (2,
   rate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[$intv])
   or irate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[5m])
)

topk (2,
   rate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[$intv] offset $diff_intv)
   or irate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[5m] offset $diff_intv)
) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

panels.title: Executions

panels.description: The number of rows read during statements' execution.

targets.expr:
topk (2,
   rate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[$intv])
   or irate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[5m])
)

topk (2,
   rate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[$intv] offset $diff_intv)
   or irate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[5m] offset $diff_intv)
) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

panels.title: rows_examined

panels.description: The number of on-disk temporary tables created.
panels.title: created_tmp_disk_tables

panels.description: The number of temporary tables created.
panels.title: created_tmp_tables

panels.description: The number of rows affected by statements.

targets.expr:
topk (2,
   rate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_affected_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[$intv])
   or irate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_affected_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[5m])
)

topk (2,
   rate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_affected_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[$intv] offset $diff_intv)
   or irate(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_affected_total{digest=~"$digest", schema=~"$schema", alias="$alias"}[5m] offset $diff_intv)
) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

panels.title: rows_affected

panels.description: The number of times no index was found.
panels.title: no_index_used

panels.description: The number of merge passes by the sort algorithm performed by statements.
panels.title: sort_merge_passes

panels.description: The number of errors. 0 if SQLSTATE signifies completion (starting with 00) or warning (01), otherwise 1.
panels.title: errors

panels.description: The number of warnings from the diagnostics area.
panels.title: warnings

previous days, You can input directly.
ex) 4d, 6w
